name: Our Darkest Hour
description:
Best Enjoyed With Headphones.

Survive as long as you can by keeping your campfire lit. Pick up objects around the world and bring them back to burn for light. If you light goes out, or you panic, you die. 

Some items in the world have longer burn times. More burn time means the campfire stays lit longer. 

Wooden Logs burn the longest.

Bundles of 2x4s burn only half as long as the logs.

Cardboard boxes burn for a short time. 

Pick your fuel wisely, but keep it going. 

*Warning*

There are a number of scary sounds in this game. While there are no 'jump scares', there are moments when the sounds can be sudden and a little loud.
